Class AdminProfileListFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
ca.yapper.yapperapp.AdminFragments.SearchFragments.AdminProfileListFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class AdminProfileListFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
Fragment to display the user profiles stored in the database as lists that only admins can browse

    • onCreateView

      @Nullable public android.view.View onCreateView(@NonNull android.view.LayoutInflater inflater, @Nullable android.view.ViewGroup container, @Nullable android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Inflates the fragments layout, sets up views, and starts search function all related to user profiles from the app
      Overrides:
      onCreateView in class androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      Parameters:
      inflater - LayoutInflater used to inflate the fragment layout.
      container - The parent view that this fragment's UI is attached to.
      savedInstanceState - Previous state data, if any.
      Returns:
      The root view of the fragment.

    • loadUsers

      private void loadUsers()
      Obtains profile information from all users and updates the list adapters.

    • setupSearch

      private void setupSearch()
      Function that sets up the search functionality for admin lists of user profiles Uses the listener to detect changes in text and update whats shown for the lists accordingly.

    • filterUsers

      private void filterUsers(String searchText)
      Function that filters profile list based on searchText string and updates the UI with an adapter.
      Parameters:
      searchText - Text from user search bar input, used to filter the profile list.

    • updateEmptyState

      private void updateEmptyState()
      Function to check if list is empty and change visibility accordingly. If list is empty, it will display a custom message for user convenience .
